Posts.Content: Good luck, I hope it all goes well for you. Report
Posts.Title: Waiting for results for breast cancer.

Posts.Content: I think I read somewhere that nine out of ten people recalled are OK as either the mammogram was not done properly, they think they see something and it is nothing etc. etc. Report
Posts.Title: mammogram recall

Posts.Content: There are several blood tests analysed together that might indicate various cancers. The blood is very good at showing our general state of health.  I think the worst part of any tests is not knowing and waiting for the results. I don't think doctors realise how traumatic and stressful this can be.  Report
Posts.Title: Waiting for results for breast cancer.

Posts.Content: The chances of it being malignant is very low, around ninety per cent of lumps in the breast are benign. Report
Posts.Title: Armpit pain and lump in breast

Posts.Content: It is awful having to wait. I don't think doctors realise the stress people go through. Report
Posts.Title: Armpit pain and lump in breast

Posts.Content: It sounds like a sebaceous cyst and it has been confirmed by your obgyn. In fact they don't come to a head like a pimple. A lot of people get them and do nothing about them, if they are painless. Report Thank you very much. I appreciate your response Report
Posts.Title: lump on bra line, Dr dismissed it, extremely worried and need advice.

Posts.Content: I understand that of those called back nine out of ten people are found to have benign problems.  Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram
